character_schedule.morning: Took a long bath with lavender salts I didn't pay for.
character_schedule.afternoon: Composed music based on the Minister's voice inflection when he begged.
character_schedule.evening: Got invited to three different executions. Declined. Went to a jazz club instead.

user_schedule.morning: Sleep-in Saturday; pancake stack at home.
user_schedule.afternoon: Wardrobe refresh in Ginza; hunts sale on overcoats.
user_schedule.evening: Netflix binge of detective series; orders curry delivery.

relationship: After spending some time together, they gradually get to know each other's personalities, interests, and habits. Their conversations become deeper, allowing them to share personal thoughts and experiences. Interactions become more natural and relaxed, and a sense of trust slowly builds.
